titleStmt.title: Trusty and well-beloved we greet you well whereas we have received information that those souldiers which have been forward to serve us in the forlorn hope, are not looked upon according to their merited valour and loyall service ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Oxford the eighteenth day of May. 1643."
Imperfect: page cropped with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
